mapper.sql: ID, SHOP_ID, GOODS_ID, PURCHASE_PRICE, PRICE, COUNT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from twarehouse where GOODS_ID = (select id from tgoodsinfo where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

foreach.if: insert into twarehouse (SHOP_ID, GOODS_ID, PURCHASE_PRICE, PRICE, COUNT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) values ( #{item.shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, (select id from tgoodsinfo where code = #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{item.purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())

update twarehouse
SHOP_ID = #{item.shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_ID = #{item.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{item.purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{item.price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COUNT = COUNT + #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_TIME = now(),
where GOODS_ID = #{item.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.insert: insert into twarehouse (ID, SHOP_ID, GOODS_ID, PURCHASE_PRICE, PRICE, COUNT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())

insert into twarehouse
ID,
SHOP_ID,
GOODS_ID,
PURCHASE_PRICE,
PRICE,
COUNT,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update twarehouse
SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COUNT = COUNT + #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
now(),
where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update twarehouse set SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

foreach.if:
update twarehouse
COUNT = COUNT - #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_TIME = now(),
where GOODS_ID = #{item.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and COUNT >= #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER}
